root.name: Beyond Atlantis
root.description: OverviewBeyond Atlantis is an adventure game developed by Cryo Interactive and published by DreamCatcher Interactive (US version), Sega (Japanese version), and Cryo Interactive Entertainment (European version) for the PC and Mac platforms.

similar_games.game: Gabriel Knight 3: Blood of the Sacred, Blood of the Damned
